text:
In the following filter: 

    <filter id="dropShadow" width="1.3" height="1.3" >
       <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="0.1 0.1"/> 
       <feOffset dx="0.1" dy="0.1" />
       <feComponentTransfer result="shadow">
          <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0" intercept="0" />
       </feComponentTransfer>
       <feMerge>
          <feMergeNode />
          <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
       </feMerge>
    </filter>

the slope in feFuncA can be set to any value and will always 
come out as identity....
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
deweese@apache.org
text:
Could not reproduce this with current CVS.
Tried changing batikLogo.svg to use given
filter, worked, chaing transfer in existing batikLogo worked.
